activity_c.text: I bought this food grinder from your shop last month, but it’s not working properly.
Could you please tell me what seems to be the problem?
I always clean the grinder properly after use, so I don’t think it’s because of dirt or leftover food. (Always – 100%)
Well, the grinder usually works fine for the first few minutes, but then the motor makes a strange noise. (Usually – about 90%)
I often have to open the lid and push the ingredients down with a spoon. (Often – about 75–85%)
It sometimes even gives off a burning smell. (Sometimes – about 50%)
I rarely use the highest speed. (Rarely – about 10%)
Does the blade still rotate smoothly?
Did you notice any cracks in the jar or rubber seal?
Please fill out this return form. We’ll check the fault and issue a replacement once confirmed.
Would you like a replacement or a repair?
If possible, I’d prefer a replacement. I use it almost every day for my cooking.
